overlays.name: Map Display
overlays.css: .map-display { width: 100%; height: 100%; background-color: #1f2937; border-radius: 8px; padding: 10px; display: flex; flex-direction: column; align-items: center; box-sizing: border-box; } .map-name { color: white; font-family: sans-serif; font-size: 22px; font-weight: bold; margin-bottom: 10px; } .map-image { max-width: 100%; max-height: calc(100% - 40px); object-fit: contain; }

overlays.name: Sponsor Carousel
overlays.css: .sponsor-carousel { width: 100%; height: 100%; overflow: hidden; } .sponsor-track { display: flex; animation: scroll 20s linear infinite; } .sponsor-track img { height: 50px; margin: 0 20px; } @keyframes scroll { 0% { transform: translateX(0); } 100% { transform: translateX(-100%); } }
overlays.js: const track = document.querySelector('.sponsor-track'); const sponsors = this.props.sponsors; sponsors.forEach(url => { const img = document.createElement('img'); img.src = url; track.appendChild(img); });
